member.name: IImageList2.DiscardImages
member.summary: Discards images from list, as specified.
member.param: An index of first image to discard.
An index of last image to discard.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: Discard images flags. ILDI_STANDBY and ILDI_PURGE are mutually exclusive. ILDI_RESETACCESS can be combined with either. One or more of the following are valid.

listheader.description: Ask whether access flag is set (but do not reset).

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IImageList2.ForceImagePresent
member.summary: Forces an image present, as specified.
member.param: An index of image to force present.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: Force image flags. One of the following is valid.

listheader.description: Always get the image (can be slow).

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IImageList2.GetCallback
member.summary: Gets an image list callback object.
member.param: Reference to a desired IID.
Contains the address of a pointer to a callback object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IImageList2.GetOriginalSize
member.summary: Gets the original size of a specified image.
member.param: The index of desired image.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: Flags for getting original size. One of the following is valid.

listheader.description: Always get the original size (can be slow).
Only get if present or on standby.

member.param: A pointer to the x-axis count.
A pointer to the y-axis count.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IImageList2.GetStatistics
member.summary: Gets an image list statistics structure.
member.param: A pointer to the structure.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IImageList2.Initialize
member.param: Width, in pixels, of each image.
Height, in pixels, of each image.
A combination of Image List Creation Flags.
Number of images that the image list initially contains.
Number of new images that the image list can contain.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IImageList2.PreloadImages
member.param: A pointer to an structure containing information about an image list draw operation.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IImageList2.Replace2
member.summary: Replaces an image in an image list.
member.param: The index of the image to replace.
A handle to the bitmap that contains the image.
A handle to the bitmap that contains the mask. If no mask is used with the image list, this parameter is ignored.
A pointer to the interface.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: Specifies how the mask is applied to the image as one or a bitwise combination of the following decoration flags.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IImageList2.ReplaceFromImageList
member.summary: Replaces an image in one image list with an image from another image list.
member.param: The index of the destination image in the image list. This is the image that is overwritten by the new image.
A pointer to the source image list.
The index of the source image in the image list pointed to by pil.
A pointer to the interface.
Not used; must be 0.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IImageList2.Resize
member.param: The x-axis count, in pixels, for the new size.
The y-axis count, in pixels, for the new size.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IImageList2.SetCallback
member.param: A pointer to the callback interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IImageList2.SetOriginalSize
member.summary: Sets the original size of a specified image.
member.param: An index of desired image.
The x-axis count.
The y-axis count.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IImageList2
member.summary: Extends by providing additional methods for manipulating and interacting with image lists.
